article.title: ESN to Support Module Test and Repair Program
article.text: Engineering Services Network Inc., Arlington, Virginia, has been awarded a contract from the Naval Undersea Warfare Center Newport Division (NUWC) to directly support the NUWC Newport detachment field engineering office, Norfolk, Virginia, for the Module Test and Repair Program. The contract includes a $2.6 million base year and four option years. If all option years are exercised, the contract will be worth $13.5 million. ESN will provide the logistical research and technical development of technical data packages and the life-cycle support, repair and refurbishment of circuit card assemblies, electronic modules and module test and repair equipment.Â The company also will provide systems installation of the USM-674/USM-676 equipment suites and provide required training to support these efforts across multiple Defense Department installations.
